official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 Federal income tax rate increases on trusts established for the benefit of individuals with disabilities.
short_title: Persons With Disabilities Trusts Tax Rate Restoration Act

summary.text: Persons With Disabilities Trusts Tax Rate Restoration Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 1993 rate increase on trusts for individuals who are disabled.

titles.title: Persons With Disabilities Trusts Tax Rate Restoration Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 Federal income tax rate increases on trusts established for the benefit of individuals with disabilities.
